description: A massive gladiatorial arena in Dressrosa where a tournament is being held with the Mera Mera no Mi as the prize. The colosseum features multiple blocks for battle royale preliminaries and can hold hundreds of competitors and thousands of spectators.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Arrives at Corrida Colosseum
keyEvents.description: Luffy and Franky arrive at the Corrida Colosseum to participate in the tournament for the Mera Mera no Mi.
keyEvents.significance: The beginning of the tournament arc that introduces multiple important characters.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Registers as Lucy
keyEvents.description: Luffy registers for the tournament under the alias 'Lucy' with contestant number 0556.
keyEvents.significance: Creation of the Lucy alias crucial for the arc.

keyEvents.title: Tournament Structure Revealed
keyEvents.description: The four-block battle royale structure with 556 participants is explained.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes the tournament framework for the arc.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Defeats Spartan
keyEvents.description: Luffy defeats Spartan with a single blow in the registration area.
keyEvents.significance: First display of Luffy's combat superiority in the colosseum.

keyEvents.title: Cavendish Introduces Himself
keyEvents.description: Cavendish introduces himself to Lucy at the Corrida Colosseum.
keyEvents.significance: Introduction of an important character who later joins the Straw Hat Grand Fleet.

statusHistory.reason: Tournament begins and colosseum is operational

description: A colorful island kingdom in the New World ruled by Donquixote Doflamingo. Known for its passionate culture, toys that come to life, and the Corrida Colosseum. The island hides dark secrets beneath its vibrant exterior.

keyEvents.title: Franky and Thunder Soldier Team Up
keyEvents.description: Franky questions Thunder Soldier about the Donquixote family and factories while traveling through Dressrosa.
keyEvents.significance: Beginning of the investigation into Dressrosa's dark secrets.

keyEvents.title: Sanji and Violet Explore Dressrosa
keyEvents.description: Sanji wanders around Dressrosa with Violet, exploring the island.
keyEvents.significance: Development of Sanji's subplot and exploration of Dressrosa's geography.

statusHistory.reason: Straw Hats and allies are exploring the island
